entry.title: WOULD YOU LIKE A NEW HEART? With Doug Batchelor

media:group.media:title: WOULD YOU LIKE A NEW HEART? With Doug Batchelor
media:group.media:description:
WOULD YOU LIKE A NEW HEART?
(𝐒𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐮𝐩 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐞𝐱𝐭 𝐧𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐛𝐲 𝐭𝐞𝐱𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐝 "𝐫𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐯𝐞𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟎" 𝐭𝐨 𝟒𝟎𝟓𝟒𝟒)
If there was ever a time we needed deep heart-searching revival, it’s now! The worldwide pandemic reminds us that we are nearing the return of Christ. Let’s not put off the spiritual preparation we will all need as we face the final events. Ellen White reminds us, “A revival of true godliness among us is the greatest and most urgent of all our needs. To seek this should` be our first work.” —Selected Messages, Vol. 1, page 121 As thousands are sobered by these momentous times and search for spiritual answers, especially during this Easter and Passover season, let’s invite our friends and neighbors to join us in a time of forsaking sin and rededicating our lives to Christ. 𝐏𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐣𝐨𝐢𝐧 𝐮𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝟏𝟎-𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬: · 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐞𝐧-𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐫𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐯𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐫𝐞𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐚𝐲, 𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭𝐥𝐲 𝐀𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐥 𝟏𝟎-𝟏𝟕 𝐚𝐭 𝟕:𝟎𝟎𝐩𝐦 𝐏𝐓 · 𝐒𝐚𝐛𝐛𝐚𝐭𝐡 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐀𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐥 𝟏𝟏𝐭𝐡 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟏𝟖𝐭𝐡 𝐚𝐭 𝟏𝟏:𝟎𝟎:𝐩𝐦 𝐏𝐓. · 𝐒𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐮𝐩 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐭𝐞𝐱𝐭 𝐧𝐨𝐭𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐛𝐲 𝐭𝐞𝐱𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐝 𝐫𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐯𝐞𝟐𝟎𝟐𝟎 𝐭𝐨 𝟒𝟎𝟓𝟒𝟒 · 𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐠𝐢𝐟𝐭 𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐬 · 𝐐 & 𝐀 𝐞𝐚𝐜𝐡 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 · 𝐒𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐧𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 (𝐀𝐩𝐫𝐢𝐥 𝟏𝟐) 𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐢𝐚𝐥 𝐁𝐢𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐀𝐧𝐬𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐬 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐦 View this series online at our livesteam page here: https://www.amazingfacts.org/media-library on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/AmazingFacts/ or on AFTV

entry.title: Why didn't King Herod kill baby John the Baptist? with Doug Batchelor

media:group.media:title: Why didn't King Herod kill baby John the Baptist? with Doug Batchelor
media:group.media:description: Why didn't King Herod kill baby John the Baptist? with Doug Batchelor

media:group.media:title: Changed Lives - Sue
media:group.media:description:
➤ Testimonies of Changed Lives - https://www.amazingfacts.org/news-and-features/changed-lives ➤ Share Your Testimony - https://www.amazingfacts.org/about-us/tell-your-story
Sue shares her testimony of how a mistaken knock on her door changed her and her husband's life after the untimely death of their son ...

media:group.media:title: Healed and Forgiven
media:group.media:description:
➤ Testimonies of Changed Lives - https://www.amazingfacts.org/news-and-features/changed-lives ➤ Share Your Testimony - https://www.amazingfacts.org/about-us/tell-your-story
By the time Vincent was 19, he had been swept away with the world. He listened to satanic music that blasphemed Jesus. In fact, his fall into darkness was so deep that, one day, while listening to this music, he carved ‘666’ into the knuckles on his hand—deep enough to make sure the scars stay. But when Amazing Facts Study Guides and DVDs made it into his hands, his life and his wife's began to change … and a wonderful, modern-day miracle of healing took place!

media:group.media:title: Changed Lives - Teresita
media:group.media:description:
➤ Testimonies of Changed Lives - https://www.amazingfacts.org/news-and-features/changed-lives ➤ Share Your Testimony - https://www.amazingfacts.org/about-us/tell-your-story
Teresita's shares her testimony of how she used to be a nun in a convent but was yearning for something more inside. By the providence of God she received an invitation to the Millennium of Prophecy seminar ... watch her story to learn what happened.
